plot outline: Nethra doesn't believe in love and she decides to marry a guy of her father's choice. Nethra in her always dreams of a man who meets her after murdering a girl. One day she meets the man of her wild dreams in real life and is startled by his existence. And what happens next? Will be a spooky story unfolds revealing a series of horrifying secrets.
